title: Mediterranean fish stew
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 leek, trimmed and sliced', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 celery stick, sliced', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '1 tbsp tomato pur√©e (preferably sun-dried)', '450ml fish stock', '150ml dry white wine', '1 bay leaf', '250g whiting fillets, cut into chunks', '250g haddock fillets, cut into chunks', '125g chilled seafood selection', '2 tbsp Pernod (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 tbsp shredded fresh basil to garnish']
